rule: The list of company names must not include any entities that are not explicitly mentioned as companies.
input: Text: According to The Wall Street Journal, Apple and Google are working on improving security features. Employees, including Jane Doe, back these measures.
output:
Company names: Apple, Google
People names: Jane Doe
Specific topics: improved security, employees support
General themes: cooperation between companies, enhancing security features
complianceText:

The entity categories are also clearly labeled, adhering to the specified format.

No violation.
